ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpmProject

Class Color

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.dpmProject.Color

  • public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods need for color identification This method is achieved by ranking the RGB space Euclidean distance to find the most likely color of the ring
    Author:
    Team 12

    • Method Detail

      • euclidean

        public static double euclidean(double rN,
                               double gN,
                               double bN,
                               double rM,
                               double gM,
                               double bM)
        calculates the euclidean distance in RGB space
        Parameters:
        rN - normalized red reading
        gN - normalized green reading
        bN - normalized blue reading
        rM - mean red value for a color
        gM - mean green value for a color
        bM - mean blue value for a color
        Returns:
        the euclidean distance in double

        g - green reading

      • color

        public static int color()
        This method identifies the color (in TR int) of the ring
        Returns:
        int color value of the target rang, 1 is blue, 2 is green, 3 is yellow and 4 is orange
